column4: I'm trying to set up knockd to listen for a sequence of udp packets, but it's not seeing any coming in.  any idea what I could be doing wrong?
have you tried running tcpdump to see if that sees them?
no, i've not.  I will, thanks
tcpdump shows that the packet isn't arriving.  I'm using cygwin's 'nc -u' on a Windows box to send it.  should that work?
